name: azure-spot-vm-manager
description: High-performance TypeScript-based monitoring solution for Azure Spot VM eviction detection and automated recovery

scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && wrangler deploy --env dev-webhook && wrangler deploy --env dev-processor
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && wrangler deploy --env staging-webhook && wrangler deploy --env staging-processor
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && wrangler deploy --env webhook && wrangler deploy --env processor
